pages.text: Witchcraft utilizes several natural crops for the art. These crops are used for $(l:bewitchment:rituals/rituals)Rituals$(), $(l:bewitchment:brewing/brewing_basics)Brewing$(), and many other things.$(br2)Seeds for these crops can be found in wild grass, much like other seeds.

The four regular crops are Aconite, Belladonna, Garlic, and Mandrake.$(br2)Aconite is mostly used as a neurotoxin, whereas Belladonna is known for causing physical harm. Garlic embodies healing, and Mandrake enhances magic.
Garlic can also be roasted into delicious Grilled Garlic.
Grilled Garlic can in turn be crafted into even more delicious Garlic Bread.
